mapper.select: select id, btype, status, groupName, name, birth, phone, email, zipcode, addr1, addr2, SunLightYn, modelname, UseYn, DATE_FORMAT(CreatedAt, '%Y.%m.%d') CreatedAt, DATE_FORMAT(UpdatedAt, '%Y.%m.%d') UpdatedAt from business where UseYn = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into business (BType, Status, GroupName, Name, Birth, Phone, Email, Zipcode, Addr1, Addr2, SunLightYn, ModelName) values(#{btype}, #{status}, #{groupName}, #{name}, #{birth}), #{phone}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}), #{addr2}, #{sunLightYn}, #{modelName}));
mapper.update: update business set UseYn = 'N' where id = #{id}
